mapper.select: select POSTCODE,POSTCTCODE, (select CtName from TUNA_CATEGORY ct where p.POSTCTCODE = ct.ctCode)as ctName ,PMEMCODE, PTITLE, PCONTENT, substr(PCREATETIME,0,8) as PCREATETIME,substr(PCORRECTIONTIME,0,8) as pCorrectionTime, PPRICE,PSALESSTATUS,POPENSTATUS,PVIEW from TUNA_POST p order by postCode
mapper.update: update TUNA_POST set pView = pView + 1 where postCode = #{postCode}
update TUNA_POST set POPENSTATUS = 'N' where postCode = #{postCode}
mapper.select: select POSTCODE,POSTCATEGORYCODE,PMEMCODE, PTITLE, PCONTENT, substr(PCREATETIME,0,8) as PCREATETIME,substr(PCORRECTIONTIME,0,8), PPRICE,PSALESSTATUS,POPENSTATUS,PVIEW from TUNA_POST where PTITLE like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or PCONTENT like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by postCode
